newsitem.title: UK: CRICKET-ENGLAND WIN TOSS AND BAT IN THIRD ONE-DAY INTERNATIONAL. [CORRECTED 11:15 GMT]
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-ENGLAND WIN TOSS AND BAT IN THIRD ONE-DAY INTERNATIONAL. [CORRECTED 11:15 GMT]

text.p: Englandcaptain Mike Atherton won the toss and elected to bat first in the third one-day international against Pakistan at Trent Bridge on Sunday.
England: Nick Knight, Alec Stewart, Mike Atherton (captain), Mike Maynard, Graham Lloyd, Ronnie Irani, Adam Hollioake, Robert Croft, Darren Gough, Peter Martin, Allan Mullally.
Pakistan: Saeed Anwar, Shahid Anwar, Ijaz Ahmed, Aamir Sohail, Shadab Kabir, Asif Mujtaba, Rashid Latif, Wasim Akram, Waqar Younis, Saqlain Mushtaq (corrects name from Mushtaq Ahmed), Shahid Nazir.
